Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $800,000. Considering its significance and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose an exclusive offer tailored to your needs. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional item at a special price of $750,000. This offer not only provides you with a significant saving but also ensures you receive the best quality and service. I look forward to discussing the details further and welcoming you as a valued member of our esteemed clientele. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
